item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

Hello, i’m using a delta server. I’m adding Slash Bash as a boss, but all he does is use melee attacks and it’s too easy because he won’t hit anything if you just have melee protect on. How do i make him use magic attacks too?

EDIT: Got it! Just search in NPC handler:
